info.name: Spacebattles - remove times new roman from threads
info.description: sets font family to inherit !important in thread messages if the font was set to times new roman
info.additionalInfo:
i realized when i was reading a geeks guide
that it was using times new roman
so i changed the font family to what sb normally uses
this does ruin threads if you actually want times new roman, so.. i can't think of many situations where you would be using that on purpose?
